unittitle_ssm: Robert Todd Lincoln letter to William B. Davenport
abstract_ssm: One 1911 letter from Robert Todd Lincoln to William B. Davenport regarding a visit made by President Abraham Lincoln to Brooklyn to consult with Henry Ward Beecher on the Emancipation Proclamation.
